DataElement.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Week Concerned About Disruption of Home Life Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how often they were concerned about disruption of home life during the past week, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Week Concerned About Disruption of Home Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London._A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual is or was concerned about disruption of their home life._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.:A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Concepts.longName: European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer
Concepts.definition: A group with aims to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.

Concepts.longName: Quality of Life Questionnaire - Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumors 21
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Concerned About Home Life Disruption Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about whether an individual is or was concerned about disruption of their home life.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about whether an individual has or had concerns about disruption of their home life.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
